name: Bean Together
description:
Bean Together

Cappuccino (aka Cino) is separated from their hot babe, Latte (aka Taytay) and Cino cannot function without his daily Latte.

This iconic duo (according to them) have been separated due to the vicious hands of hard-core coffee drinking millennials. 

Cino needs to find their way back to their home and lover; to do this, they must travel through the cafes of France to get back together with their lover.

These lovers are too hot to handle,  but once they cool down no one wants them, even Taytay. They don't like their coffee lukewarm.

Stay hot, and don't lose your froth.

Tips:

Don't get too milky but don't lose too much milk!

Move: A, D or Left and Right Arrows

Jump: Space

Next Level: N

Last Level: L

Restart Level: R

Credits:

Nathaniel: Barista (aka Coffee Connoisseur)

Nat's Toothbrush: Victim for the sake of ART
